column4: I found the driver in an exe file, and I've tried unzipping it, unshielding it, and cabextracting it, but none of those have worked, what should I do?
cabextract should work.  are you sure you have the right driver exe?
I looked up the driver on http://ndiswrapper.sourceforge.net/mediawiki/index.php/List, so I'm fairly sure I have the right one
it says there aren't any cabinets in it
what's the letter.number reference for your card on that list?
seemed to go ok for me. :-/
hmm, I wonder what I'm doing wrong, maybe it's objecting to me extracting to the desktop rather than a folder?
it works now, thanks for your help!
